{{{
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>

// fileIn.txt
// 123 a 456

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    basic_string<char> strFileName("/Users/jeffreysun/Documents/fileIn.txt");
   
    basic_ifstream<char> istream;
    istream.open(strFileName.c_str());
   
    cout<< "Is open: " << istream.is_open() << endl;
    int i, j;
    char c;
    istream >> i;
    istream >> c;
    istream >> j;
    cout << i << endl;
    cout << c << endl;
    cout << j << endl;
}
}}}
